name: Ironlaw
description:
Ironlaw is a game that combines the colony management aspects of games like Dwarf Fortress and Gnomoria with the party-based war, diplomacy and quests mechanics of Mount & Blade.Features
  • Take control of a person in a procedurally generated world
  • Recruit people to join your party of fighters
  • Build colonies in multiple biomes anywhere on the map
  • Visit procedurally generated cities
  • Extremely moddable
Work in progress features
  • Complete procedurally generated quests given by inhabitants of the world
  • Fight battles with enemy troops
  • Conquer enemy cities
  • Design your own custom maps and cities
